import { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../styles/User.module.css' const UserSignupForm = ({ closeForm}) => { const [values,setValues] = useState({ name : '', email:'', avatar:'', password:'', }) const handleChange = ({target: {value,name}}) => { setValues({...value,[name]:value}) } return (
Sign Up
I already have an account
) } export default UserSignupForm
